participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.background: my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.background: mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i am in the third grade. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen.

content.text: Nice to see you! I like to run and watch marathons.
I love running and running and running
I love running and running and running
